posts.title: SqList
posts.excerpt: 线性表_顺序表综合应用
posts.text: 线性表_顺序表综合应用 1、删除最小元素，返回并由最后元素填补 123456789101112131415bool Del_Min(SqList &L , ElemType &value){ if(L.length == 0) return false ; value = L.data(0); int pos = 0; for(int i = 1 ; i<L.length ; i++){ if (value < L.data(i)){ value = L.data(i); pos = i; } } L.data(pos) = L.data(L.length-1); L.length-- ; return true ;} 2、顺序表元素逆置 123456789void Reverse(Sqlist &L){//逆置只需操作内存地址中的值，无需做任何返回需求，所以用void返回ElemType temp ; //辅助变量for (int i = 0 ; i<(L.length/2) ; i++){ temp = L.data[i]; L.data(i) = L.data[L.length-i-1]; L.length[L.length-i-1] = temp ; }} 3、删除顺序表中所有值为x的元素1)、变量k记录所有不是x的元素1234567891011void Del_x(Sqlist &L , ElemType x ){ int k = 0; for (int i = 0 ; i<L.length ; i++){ if (L.data[i] != x){ L.data[k] = L.data[i]; k++; } }L.length = k;}2)、变量k记录所有等于x元素的个数123456789void Del_x(Sqlist &L ,ElemType x){ int k = 0; for (int i = 0 ; i<L.length ; i++){ if (L.data[i] == x) k++; else L.data[i-k] = L.data[i]; }L.length- = k;}4、从有序表删除左右与给定值s~t之间的元素 123456789101112131415bool Del_s_t(SqList &L , ElemType s , ElemType t ){ if (s>=t || L.length <= 0) return false ; for (int i = 0 ; i<L.length&&L.data[i]>s ; i++){ if (i>=L.length) return false ; } for (int j = i ; j<L.length ; j++){ if (L.data[j]>t) L.data[i++] = L.data[j]; }L.length = i ; //不用减一是因为数组和表的下标差一return true ;} 5、2011年408真题求两个等长升序序列的中位数 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829//此题可用基础排序 | 快排 | 冒泡 等都看一手int M_Search (int A[] , int B [] , int n ){ int s1 = 0 ,d1 = n-1 , s2 = 0 , d2 = n-1 ; while (s1 != d1 || s2 != d2 ){ int m1 = (s1+d1)/2; int m2 = (s2+d2)/2; if (m2 == m1) return A[m1]; if (A[m1]<B[m2]) if ((s1+d2)%2 == 0 ){ s1 = m1 ; d2 = m2 ; } else { s1 = m1 +1 ; d2 = m2 ; } } else { if ((s2+d2)%2 == 0){ d1 = m1; s2 = m2; } else { d1 = m1 ; s2 = m2+1 ; } }}
